artist: Artist: Patrick Caulfield; Author: Jules Laforgue; Translator: Patricia Terry; Publisher: Petersburg Press Ltd., London; Printer: Frank Kicherer, Stuttgart, Germany
creditline: Gift of The Saul P. Steinberg Collection
description: A book containing 21 poems by LaForgue and 22 screenprint illustrations, also six separate screenprints by Caulfield. binding: grey leather; endpapers: grey paper to match leather; slipcase: grey leather
inscription: Inscribed, signed, and numbered in pencil on the colophon page: Edition A    Patrick Caulfield / 74/200
medium: Color screenprints, letterpress; bound volume separate portfolio housed in a single slipcase
title: Some Poems of Jules Laforgue
